name: Data Migration Tool
description: Migrate records from external systems (ArchivesSpace, Vernon CMS, Preservica OPEX/PAX) with field mapping, Gearman background jobs, sector-specific CSV export, rights and provenance import
author: The Archive and Heritage Group
features: Web UI import with visual field mapping
OPEX rights extraction (SecurityDescriptor, dc:rights, MODS, EAD)
Sector-specific CSV exporters (Archives, Museum, Library, Gallery, DAM)
Automatic slug, publication status, and nested set calculation

changelog.1.2.0: Added Preservica OPEX/PAX support, rights import, provenance import, Gearman jobs
changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with field mapping UI
